abstract: Previous immigrants to Austria volunteer at makeshift facilities, helping to process current wave of refugees; savor chance to assist and identify with people of common background, even as they continue to struggle with their own displacement and acceptance in new country.
lead_paragraph: Dozens of Arabic-speaking Muslims are among the 2,000 or so volunteers in the Austrian capital helping migrants adjust to new lives.

headline.main: Volunteers, Many Once Refugees Themselves, Help as Guides in Vienna
headline.print_headline: Volunteers, Many Once Refugees Themselves, Help as Guides in Vienna

snippet: Dozens of Arabic-speaking Muslims are among the 2,000 or so volunteers in the Austrian capital helping migrants adjust to new lives.
